document.title: EiffelStudio preferences for Automatic completion: Introduction

paragraph.paragraph:
EiffelStudio editor can detect many keywords and trigger an automatic syntax completion. This section of the documentation contains a description of
./10_automatic_keyword_completion.xml what can be customized . You will also find an
./20_keyword_completion_customization.xml explanation of the syntax to be used in completion preferences,
./30_keyword_completion_default_values.xml and their default values .
